mapper.insert: INSERT INTO image_search_sessions (user_id, created_at, action_type) VALUES (#{userId}, NOW(), #{actionType}::image_action_type_enum)
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, created_at, action_type FROM image_search_sessions WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT * FROM image_search_sessions ORDER BY id DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE image_search_sessions SET user_id = #{userId}, created_at = #{createdAt}, action_type = #{actionType}::image_action_type WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT s.id, s.user_id, s.created_at, s.action_type FROM image_search_sessions s WHERE s.user_id = #{userId} AND ( SELECT array_agg(image_place_id ORDER BY image_place_id) FROM image_search_candidates WHERE image_search_session_id = s.id ) = ( SELECT array_agg(unnest ORDER BY unnest) FROM unnest(#{placeIds}::bigint[]) ) ORDER BY s.created_at DESC LIMIT 1
